Monster type list
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): FAQ: Monster type list
By GoldenBoy on Saturday, November 29, 2003 - 05:39 pm:

This table will become similar to one we worked up from what was fiven in the MRA2 manual. In that game there were certain combining rules based on the group the monsters were in. I'm not saying they are the same for MR4 but I imagine there are rules, but this time we have to figure them out on our own.

SpritesBeasts
AntlanHare
GaruMogi
LesioneRipper
PixieTiger
SuzurinRaiden
OgyoMadillo
PanchoZuum

FancifulArtificial
MocchiZan

NagaHenger
RhinoRollerMew

By Infernus on Sunday, November 30, 2003 - 11:34 am:

If combining is anything like it was in MRA2, or if we figure combining out more, this helps show certain monster types compatability.

By GoldenBoy on Sunday, November 30, 2003 - 05:32 pm:

Figuring out the rules will help us take one step twoards
making the best possible combos. If you read any of the
combining info in the MR2 archives, the process for getting
the best combos is very precise. Groups of breeds is an
added wrinkle in MRA2 and MR4, just another step in the
path.
